programme.title: Kennedy's last stand
programme.short_synopsis: Senator Kennedy's last hope of winning backing for presidential vote.
programme.medium_synopsis: Senator Kennedy talks tough as he faces last major showdown in the Democrats' primaries. The sound quality on this recording is variable/poor.
programme.long_synopsis:
Senator Kennedy talks tough as he faces last major showdown in the Democrats' primaries. The sound quality on this recording is variable/poor.

This archive edition of Letter from America was recorded by one of two listeners, who between them taped and labelled over 650 Letter From America programmes from 1973 to 1989. It was restored by the BBC in 2014.

display_title.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
display_title.subtitle: Kennedy's last stand

programme.title: Letter from America by Alistair Cooke
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke’s weekly talks on American life, history and politics from 1946 – 2004.
